name: objutil
description: Javascript Object util methods, with ES6 tree shaking methods: assign(extend), merge, exclude, default, pick. Customize the APIs into one file.

scripts.make: rollup -c && cd dist && uglifyjs objutil.iife.js -c -m -o objutil.min.js && grunt bump
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: James Yang <jamesyang999@gmail.com>
